      class  simplePtx.area
      This class describe what an area is in the context of the ptx library.
      static class  simplePtx.area_shape
      Main function that calls other sub function in order to parse the selected image and get the list of areas.
      class  simplePtx.cam
      This class aims at easing the process of capturing image from the camera in processing, both in its setup and in its usage.
      static class  simplePtx.cameraState 
      static class  simplePtx.DIRECTION 
      static class  simplePtx.globState 
      class  simplePtx.hueInterval
      This class represents an interval of hue over the chromatic wheel (between 0 and 360 in value).
      class  simplePtx.ptx
      This class defines the core algorithm for drawing recognition and optical processing.
      class  simplePtx.ptx_inter
      This class is the main one in the PTX library.
      static class  simplePtx.recogState 
      class  simplePtx.vec2f
      Simple class defining a 2 dimension mathematical vector with floats as well as helper class to help manipulating them.
      class  simplePtx.vec2i
      Simple class defining a 2 dimension mathematical vector with integers as well as helper class to help manipulating them.
